title: Real Zeros of a Rational Functions - calculator

content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator 5 x cubed minus 9 x plus 4 over denominator x squared minus 3 x plus 2 end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>. At which of the following values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> does the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> have an <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>-intercept?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x equals 1"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 2"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math> only
​​<math alttext="x equals negative 1.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.525</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 0.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.525</mn></math> only

<math alttext="x equals negative 1.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.525</mn></math>​​​, <math alttext="x equals 0.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.525</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 2"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math> only

<math alttext="x equals negative 1.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.525</mn></math>​​​​, <math alttext="x equals 0.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.525</mn></math>, ​<math alttext="x equals 1"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 2"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

content.answer: ​​<math alttext="x equals negative 1.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.525</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 0.525"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.525</mn></math> only

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
